summary: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.
cast: Tae-Hyun Cha|Jun Ji-Hyun|In-mun Kim|Wok-suk Song|Jin-hie Han|Sook-hee Hyun|Il-woo Kim|Soon-cheol Yoo|Dong-won Seo|Min-Jae Kim|Nam-hwi Heo|Jae Ho Lee|Joon-yeong Park|Cheol-ho Hyeon|Jong-hun Hyeon|Kyeong-hun Jo|Kwang-eop Son|Jae-ha Seo|Tae-yeong Kim|Jeong-hak Lee|Jang-soo Bae|Tae-Hyun Jin|Cheol-Soo Kim|Mu-yeong Lee|Ho Lim|Geum-seok Yang|Jae-young Kwak
keywords: south korea|boyfriend girlfriend relationship|wild girl|time capsule|ends with freeze frame
title: My Sassy Girl
